remarks: Transitivity of implicit substitution into a wff.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 19-Sep-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement:
subtr.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
subtr.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
subtr2.3 $e |- F/ x ps $.
subtr2.4 $e |- F/ x ch $.
subtr2.5 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
subtr2.6 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
subtr2 $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( A = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
